description: Bovine adenosine deaminase derived from bovine intestine that has been extensively pegylated for extended serum half life.
doseSchedule: 250 [iU]/mL Injection, solution form with intramuscular route
mechanismOfAction: Pegademase converts adenosine (toxic) to inosine (less toxic) by deamination. It also converts 2'-deoxyadenosine to 2'-deoxyinosine via deamination.
name: Pegademase bovine
